body.name: LED Desk Lamp with RGB Backlight, 24W Ultra Bright Modern Architect Workbench Desk Lamps, 60" Timer, 25 Lighting Modes,Eye Protection Clamp Light for Home Office Gaming Reading Working
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 23. Order within 21 hrs 3 mins
features: 【2-in-1 Dual Light Source Design】:This desk lamp adopts a distinctive design with complementary front and back dual light source.Diminishing spatial brightness differences and providing more uniform balanced lighting across your screen and surroundings.The front light specifically illuminates your desk area,allowing you to focus on work or study.While backlight provides ambient light,enhancing overall eye comfort whether you're working or relaxing.

【Super Wide, Large and Bright】:This 24W LED clamp lamp is big and long head design which allow you to adjust the angle of the light bar. It can extend to 24 inches and fully illuminates the desk. Suitable for multi-monitor workstation, home office, large desk, study, architect, computer, drawing, sewing, crafts, painting, reading, gaming, piano. Height up to 31 inches.

【RGB contains 3 modes】The ambient backlight include flowing mode, sound rhythm mode and breathing mode,making your home office bedrooms dormitories more colorful. If choosing the sound rhrthm mode, you will feel more when watching TV, playing games and listening to music. It not only makes the work less boring, but also creates an atmosphere and enhances the computer gaming experience. Enhances overall eye comfort, no matter in screen if you are working or relaxing.

【Multi Lighting Modes & Stepless Dimming】:Touch button with indicator light, easy to operate at night, lighting and RGB is separate, it is more humane. Easily control by sensitive touch control, 5 color temperature modes,5 steps dimmable brightness levels, a variety of RGB modes can be selected. The memory function memorizes your last setting.No flickering, no ghostly freezing, non screen glare.

【Modern looking & Saving Space】:Big and long head design + gooseneck design, the gooseneck desk lamp can be flexibly adjusted to 360° according to your needs. And swing arm desk lamp for home office adopts clamp design, which is big but take up less space.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: A Desk Lamp Bring You Convenient And Keep Your Eye Healthy 45° Beam Angle Anti-Blue Light Design This clamp lamp not only free up the desktop space,but also blocking blue light by mitigating the harsh glow of the screen without direct lighting. Broaden Sight With Closer Control Menu The wide lamp head provides an extended range of illumination area,and the front control panel just within your hand's moving range.Please enjoy and keep concentrating on your work or study in this exclusive space. Combination Of Front And Back Light Clamp Desk Lamp The lamp head adopts a distinctive design with complementary front and back dual light source,aiming for diminishing spatial brightness differences and providing more uniform balanced lighting across your screen and surroundings.
Leisure Mode-backlight is ON,main light is OFF:This mode is perfect for playing games or watching movie scenario.
Studying Mode-main light is ON,backlight is OFF:This mode is good for relaxing the eyes after a long time of study.

Relaxing Mode-main light and backlight are ON:if you prefer a fully relaxing break time after working,don't miss this mode. A New Experience With Dynamic RGB Backlight Clamp Lamp Flowing Mode,Breathing Mode And Music Rhythm Dancing Mode This desk lamp for home office come with a three mode ambient backlight,which creating a visually stimulating environment,strengthening your immersive experience of movie viewing, gaming,working or relaxing. Featuring An Innovative IP Protection Design This is an IP Protection Item! We respect the efforts of all researchers and developers for their hard work.Their achievments deserve well protection.Thus, we applied the IP for this architect desk lamp.

Features Of Desk Lamp For Home Office 5 Color Modes & 5 Brightness Levels Adopts 150pcs full-spectrum energy-efficient LEDs,the lamp are especially designed for eye protection. Whether you’re working or studying, 25 modes provide you with a stable and soft light! Timer Setting & Memory Function Our desk lamp has a built-in 60 mins timer function that eases workaholic fatigue and reminds you to relax on time. The memory function memorizes the last setting when resuming work. High Color Rendering Index (Ra>90) Light sources with a CRI of higher 90 are good at color rendering ,help the color seen by your eyes are more delicate and more vivid.Greatly restoration of true natural light colors, reduce color error visual fatigue.

Specifications Product name: LED Desk Lamp Maximum power: 24W Luminous flux: 1200+- 10% lm Input / output: AC 100-240 / DC 24V/1A Power cable length: 5.4ft (about 1.8m) Color temperature: 3000-6500 k(5 levels dimming) LED type / quantity: SMD 2835 / 150 pcs Dimensions: lamp bar 24 inches (60.0 cm) upper segment 15.75 inches (40 cm), next segment 15.75 inches (40 cm), clamp 2.36 inches (6.0 cm) Package Included: 1 * Desk Lamp, 1 * Adapter, 1*Metal Clamp, 1*Screw Pack, 1 * User Manual

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This light is perfect for my computer set up. It is very bright and clamps to my desk in a very secure way. I like having a light that is out of the way and only lights up my 63inch desk. The rgb lighting looks great while i am gaming or doing music prodution. I can have both the regular light and rgb on at the same time or just the rgb or regular light. Only flaw i have is that when the light is off, the button for the rgb is not lit up. There is also a 1hr timer button that i press when i turn it on that will turn the light off if i walk away and forget too. If you need a light for u desk i recommend you get this one even if you dont need the rgb lights.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well, easy to install
reviews.reviewText: This light was pretty easy to put together, it has a few cool features and adjusting the brightness and color-temperature is very useful and easy. 100% recommended

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Instructions need a little work, but it's nice.
reviews.reviewText: This worked well, but I felt like the instructions could be a little clearer. It came with a set of 3 types of screws. One of those types, as far as I can tell, don't get used for anything. The instructions for assembly sort of specified which screw to use where, but it was more guessing what made the most sense, I think a little picture of the correct screw for each step would help (plus not having an extra screw that isn't used). There are extras if needed. Once assembled though everything works as expected. It wasn't immediately clear to me that one half of the two pieces you stick together is not actually metal (I initially thought I was missing a piece). But then I realized it is sorta rubber and bends to shape, so once you install it you can bend it down however you need it. You'll want it bent so that the lower LEDs are out of your line of sight as they are very bright, even at the lowest setting. I like that I can change the type of white light from cool to warm. I keep it at a warm temp. The RGB part is neat, but I do wish there was a mode that was solid, I would guess you'd need one extra button to cycle the colors. It has a breathing mode that slowly cycles through the colors, a dancing mode where it just has the colors rotating rapidly along the bar, and a noise mode where it lights up and flashes with noise (nice for games or music, or if you are bored in a online meeting and need some entertainment). Overall, I can't complain, the main thing I wanted was a light that could go high enough to be over my monitors and light up my work area, particularly when I'm trying to fix electronics or something.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well designed desk LED lamp
reviews.reviewText: This desk LED lamp has a very stylish and aesthetic design with adjustable height and angle, making it perfect to place just above the display screen. It's versatile for both work/study and gaming/entertainment purposes. With various brightness, color temperature, and RGB modes, it's easy to use and controlled by touch buttons. My favorite is the RGB dancing Mode, which adds a unique ambiance for gaming dancing with the music, creating a dynamic and fancy atmosphere. The overall experience is excellent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Working LED Desk Lamp
reviews.reviewText: This LED desk lamp is very impressive. The lamp's brightness is just what I needed. It's 24W of ultra-bright light that turns night into day on my desk. Whether I'm grinding through work reports or chilling with some late-night gaming, this lamp has got me covered. The light is soft yet bright, and it doesn't flicker, which is a huge plus when you're staring at a screen for hours on end.
